00013 // For now anyway, defining a macro for putting mutex/critical regions around
00014 // linklist access.
00015 // TODO: something faster for linked list thread-safety
00016 #define JAMOMA_SCHEDULER_LOCK critical_enter(0);
00017 #define JAMOMA_SCHEDULER_UNLOCK critical_exit(0);
00018 
00019 // TODO: add a "dump" method to post a list of everything that is currently scheduled
00020 
00021 // statics and globals
00022 static t_class  *class_jamoma_scheduler = NULL; // the time class

00026 // Object Life
00027 
00028 void jamoma_scheduler_initclass(void)
00029 {
00030         t_class *c = class_new("jamoma.scheduler", 
00031                                                         (method)jamoma_scheduler_new, 
00032                                                         (method)jamoma_scheduler_free, 
00033                                                         sizeof(t_jamoma_scheduler), 
00034                                                         (method)NULL, 
00035                                                         A_GIMME, 0);
00036 
00037         class_register(CLASS_NOBOX, c); 
00038         class_jamoma_scheduler = c;
00039 }
00040 
00041 
00042 t_object* jamoma_scheduler_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00043 {
00044         t_jamoma_scheduler *x = (t_jamoma_scheduler*)object_alloc(class_jamoma_scheduler);
00045         if(x){
00046                 x->event_head = NULL;
00047                 x->event_tail = NULL;
00048 
00049                 jamoma_scheduler_rewind(x);
00050                 
00051                 attr_args_process(x, argc, argv);
00052         }
00053         return (t_object*)x;
00054 }
00055 
00056 
00057 void jamoma_scheduler_free(t_jamoma_scheduler *x)
00058 {
00059         t_jamoma_event  *event = x->event_head;
00060         
00061         while(event){
00062                 sysmem_freeptr(event);
00063                 event = event->next;
00064         }
00065 }

00068 /************************************************************************************/
00069 // Methods
00070 
00071 void jamoma_scheduler_update(t_jamoma_scheduler *x, double *newTime)
00072 {
00073         x->current_time = *newTime;
00074         if(x->event_head && (x->event_head->targettime < x->current_time))
00075                 jamoma_scheduler_doevents(x);
00076 }
00077 
00078 // TODO: evaluate this method for thread-safety and performance
00079 // This is doing stuff with linklists in realtime dsp code -- that could be bad
00080 // among other things it means we have locks from critical regions which could be horrible
00081 // At the very least we want to do something really minimal in terms of locking, which
00082 // probably means using our own linked-list
00083 void jamoma_scheduler_doevents(t_jamoma_scheduler *x)
00084 {
00085         t_jamoma_event  *event = x->event_head;
00086 
00087         //JAMOMA_TIME_LOCK
00088         while(event){
00089                 if(event->targettime < x->current_time)
00090                         jamoma_event_send(event);
00091                 else
00092                         break;
00093 
00094                 event = event->next;
00095         }
00096         //JAMOMA_TIME_UNLOCK
00097 
00098         return;
00099 }
00100 
00101 
00102 void jamoma_scheduler_rewind(t_jamoma_scheduler *x)
00103 {
00104         if(!x)
00105                 x = (t_jamoma_scheduler*)obj_jamoma_scheduler;
00106 
00107         // TODO: test this, and then implement...
00108         // if something is a time-relative *delay*, we could/should offset it here
00109         // if something is a time-static *event*, then is should not be offset here
00110 
00111         x->current_time = 0.0;
00112 }
00113 
00114 
00115 // return a value between 0.0 and 1.0 which represents the current progress through a time interval
00116 void jamoma_scheduler_getphase(double period, double* phase, double* slope)
00117 {
00118         t_jamoma_scheduler      *x = (t_jamoma_scheduler*)obj_jamoma_scheduler;
00119         
00120         *phase = fmod(x->current_time, period) / period;
00121 
00122         if(slope){
00123                 // TODO: do we want to deal with a transport on this level?
00124                 // or should that be something up at a meta-level where meters and notes and tempos are?
00125                 //if(transport is not running){
00126                         double samples_per_iter = jamoma_clock_tickstosamples(obj_jamoma_clock, period);
00127                         *slope = 1.0 / samples_per_iter;
00128                 //}
00129                 //else
00130                 //      *slope = 0;
00131         }
00132 }

00135 /************************************************************************************/
00136 
00137 t_object* jamoma_scheduler_delay(t_object *client, t_object *jamoma_scheduler_obj, method callback, double *timevalue, long repeating, long priority)
00138 {
00139         t_jamoma_scheduler      *x;
00140         t_jamoma_event          *event;
00141         t_jamoma_event          *match;
00142         
00143         if(jamoma_scheduler_obj)
00144                 x = (t_jamoma_scheduler*)jamoma_scheduler_obj;
00145         else
00146                 x = (t_jamoma_scheduler*)obj_jamoma_scheduler;
00147         
00148         event = jamoma_event_new(x, client, callback, timevalue, repeating, priority);
00149 
00150         JAMOMA_SCHEDULER_LOCK
00151         
00152         if(x->event_head == NULL){
00153                 x->event_head = event;
00154                 x->event_tail = event;
00155                 goto out;
00156         }
00157         else{
00158                 // we need to figure out where to insert this event
00159                 // we will start at the end of the list as that is probably
00160                 // closer than the beginning of the list?
00161                 match = x->event_tail;
00162                 while(match){
00163                         if(match->targettime < event->targettime){
00164                                 event->next = match->next;
00165                                 event->prev = match;
00166                                 if(match->next == NULL)
00167                                         x->event_tail = event;
00168                                 else
00169                                         match->next->prev = event;
00170                                 match->next = event;
00171                                 goto out;
00172                         }
00173                         match = match->prev;
00174                 }
00175         }
00176         // if we made it to here, then we need to insert this event at the head
00177         event->next = x->event_head;
00178         x->event_head = event;
00179         event->next->prev = event;
00180 out:
00181         JAMOMA_SCHEDULER_UNLOCK
00182         return (t_object*)event;
00183 }
00184 
00185 
00186 void jamoma_scheduler_removeevent(t_jamoma_scheduler *x, t_object *anEvent)
00187 {
00188         t_jamoma_event  *event = (t_jamoma_event*)anEvent;
00189         
00190         if(!x)
00191                 x = (t_jamoma_scheduler*)obj_jamoma_scheduler;
00192 
00193         JAMOMA_SCHEDULER_LOCK
00194         if(event == x->event_head){
00195                 x->event_head = event->next;
00196                 if(x->event_head == NULL)
00197                         x->event_tail = NULL;
00198                 else
00199                         event->next->prev = NULL;
00200         }
00201         else{
00202                 event->prev->next = event->next;
00203                 if(event->next == NULL)
00204                         x->event_tail = event->prev;
00205                 else
00206                         event->next->prev = event->prev;
00207         }
00208         JAMOMA_SCHEDULER_UNLOCK
00209 
00210         // Rather than simply calling object_free(event);
00211         // we defer that call here as a hack to avoid using a mutex or critical region
00212         // because the time events executed in another thread -- hopefully this will buy 
00213         // enough time for that to finish before the object is deleted
00214         defer_low(event, (method)jamoma_event_free, NULL, 0, NULL);
00215 }
00216 
00217 
00218 void jamoma_scheduler_moveevent(t_jamoma_scheduler *x, t_jamoma_event *event, double newtime)
00219 {
00220         t_jamoma_event  *match;
00221 
00222         JAMOMA_SCHEDULER_LOCK
00223 
00224         // first, remove the item from the list without freeing it
00225         if(event == x->event_head){
00226                 x->event_head = event->next;
00227                 if(x->event_head == NULL)
00228                         x->event_tail = NULL;
00229                 else
00230                         event->next->prev = NULL;
00231         }
00232         else{
00233                 event->prev->next = event->next;
00234                 if(event->next == NULL)
00235                         x->event_tail = event->prev;
00236                 else
00237                         event->next->prev = event->prev;
00238         }
00239         
00240         // update the event
00241         event->targettime = newtime;
00242         event->next = NULL;
00243         event->prev = NULL;
00244         
00245         // finally, insert it again
00246         if(x->event_head == NULL){
00247                 x->event_head = event;
00248                 x->event_tail = event;
00249                 goto out;
00250         }
00251         else{
00252                 // we need to figure out where to insert this event
00253                 // we will start at the end of the list as that is probably
00254                 // closer than the beginning of the list?
00255                 match = x->event_tail;
00256                 while(match){
00257                         if(match->targettime < event->targettime){
00258                                 event->next = match->next;
00259                                 event->prev = match;
00260                                 if(match->next == NULL)
00261                                         x->event_tail = event;
00262                                 else
00263                                         match->next->prev = event;
00264                                 match->next = event;
00265                                 goto out;
00266                         }
00267                         match = match->prev;
00268                 }
00269                 // if we made it to here, then we need to insert this event at the head
00270                 event->next = x->event_head;
00271                 x->event_head = event;
00272                 event->next->prev = event;
00273         }
00274 out:
00275         JAMOMA_SCHEDULER_UNLOCK
00276 }

00279 /************************************************************************************/
00280 
00281 t_jamoma_event* jamoma_event_new(t_jamoma_scheduler *owner, t_object *client, method callback, double *timevalue, long repeating, long priority)
00282 {
00283         t_jamoma_event  *event = (t_jamoma_event*)sysmem_newptr(sizeof(t_jamoma_event));
00284         
00285         event->owner = (t_object*)owner;
00286         event->client = client;
00287         event->callback = callback;
00288         event->delaytime = *timevalue;
00289         event->targettime = owner->current_time + event->delaytime;
00290         event->repeating = repeating;
00291         event->priority = priority;
00292         if(priority == JCOM_EVENT_PRIORITY_MEDIUM)
00293                 event->transfer_mechanism = clock_new(event, (method)jamoma_event_dosend);
00294         else if(priority == JCOM_EVENT_PRIORITY_LOW)
00295                 event->transfer_mechanism = qelem_new(event, (method)jamoma_event_dosend);
00296         else // JCOM_TIME_PRIORITY_AUDIO
00297                 event->transfer_mechanism = NULL;
00298         
00299         event->next = NULL;
00300         event->prev = NULL;
00301 
00302         return event;
00303 }
00304 
00305 
00306 void jamoma_event_free(t_jamoma_event *event)
00307 {
00308         if(event->priority == JCOM_EVENT_PRIORITY_MEDIUM)
00309                 object_free(event->transfer_mechanism);
00310         else if(event->priority == JCOM_EVENT_PRIORITY_LOW)
00311                 qelem_free(event->transfer_mechanism);
00312         sysmem_freeptr(event);
00313 }
00314 
00315 
00316 void jamoma_event_send(t_jamoma_event *event)
00317 {
00318         if(event->priority == JCOM_EVENT_PRIORITY_HIGH)
00319                 jamoma_event_dosend(event);
00320         else if(event->priority == JCOM_EVENT_PRIORITY_MEDIUM)
00321                 clock_delay(event->transfer_mechanism, 0);
00322         else
00323                 qelem_set(event->transfer_mechanism);
00324 }
00325 
00326 
00327 void jamoma_event_dosend(t_jamoma_event *event)
00328 {
00329         event->callback(event->client);
00330         if(event->repeating)
00331                 jamoma_scheduler_moveevent((t_jamoma_scheduler*)event->owner, event, event->targettime + event->delaytime);
00332         else
00333                 jamoma_scheduler_removeevent((t_jamoma_scheduler*)event->owner, (t_object*)event);
00334 }
